org.eclipse.scada.vi.model.impl

Class TextImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • EObjectImpl
      • org.eclipse.scada.vi.model.impl.FigureImpl
        • org.eclipse.scada.vi.model.impl.TextImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Figure, Primitive, Text

    public class TextImpl
extends FigureImpl
implements Text
    An implementation of the model object 'Text'.

    The following features are implemented:

    • Text
    • Label Alignment
    • Icon Alignment
    • Text Alignment
    • Text Placement
    • Font Name
    • Font Size
    • Font Bold
    • Font Italic
